title: How is maths related or used in the subject of history? - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you describe when in history? With math - when was the Norman Conquest? 1066. When was 9–11? How long was the reign of Queen Victoria? On what date did World War II end? How long was the Great Depression? How many countries were involved in World War I? How many died in that war? Which was more devastating to western society? The Black Plague? Or World WarI? How is that determined? etc.
